short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the raw URLs of all your open tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When clicked, this extension shows all the URLs of your open tabs in a convenient way for you to copy/paste and save wherever you want, allowing you to re-visit all the open tabs you had the last time you used your browser!
